snippet: Representative Michael Grimm is collecting signatures on Capitol Hill, calling for an independent prosecutor in the MF Global case. But the question is whether a new prosecutor would provide any significant benefit or just slow down the investigation...
abstract: Representative Michael Grimm is collecting signatures on Capitol Hill, calling for an independent prosecutor in the MF Global case. But the question is whether a new prosecutor would provide any significant benefit or just slow down the investigation into MF Global's demise.

headline.main: Would a Special Counsel Help or Hurt the MF Global Inquiry?
